name: Fovea
description:
Fovea is the LED table lamp that somehow made geometry cute.

Hand turned solid Ash base with a natural beeswax finish. Cast solid brass cone body. Hand spun solid copper shade.

Uses an included 12 volt, 4W LED cylinder bulb. Integrated brass switch.

11" h X 6" w

name: Amanita - copper
description:
Amanita is an LED table lamp that could have sprouted from the forest floor.

The hand spun solid copper shade is hand hammered by skilled artisans. Each takes hours of hammering and annealing and has a beautiful, detailed texture.

Hand turned solid Ash base, cerused, with a natural beeswax finish. 

Uses an included 12 volt, 4W LED cylinder bulb. Inline switch.

8" h X 6" w

name: Theorem - cerused
description:
Theorem is an LED desk lamp inspired by the hypotenuse of a right triangle. Bonus points if you can recall from your school days what Pythagoras had to say about this special side.

Hand turned solid Ash base, cerused, with a natural beeswax finish. 

The solid brass neck is hand formed then hand finished by blackening using a natural chemical reaction.

A solid brass, hand spun paraboloid shade is blackened as well then fitted to the neck. 

Uses an included 12 volt, 3W LED wafer bulb. Inline switch.

16" h X 15" w

5" dia shade

name: Noland - black
description:
Noland is an LED table or desk lamp inspired by an Italian garden rotunda. All you daydreamers can imagine stolen kisses and special moments happening under your own little desktop architectural gem.

Hand turned solid Ash base, dyed black, with a natural beeswax finish. 

Solid brass neck rods and fittings are lightly hand polished. We leave the brass natural to develop its own patina. It changes slowly as it lives with you.

A hand spun solid copper shade is lightly polished and left natural, then fitted to the base.

Uses an included 12 volt, 4W LED cylinder bulb. 

15" h X 6" w

6" dia shade

name: Piazza - black
description:
Piazza is an LED table or desk lamp inspired by streetlamps on the Piazza del Duomo, Milan. John Ruskin did not approve of the Gothic cathedral. We, however, were very inspired, even if we did lose the Gothic influence.

Hand turned solid Ash base, dyed black, with a natural beeswax finish. 

The solid brass neck is hand formed then lightly hand polished. We leave the brass natural to develop its own patina. It changes slowly as it lives with you.

A solid brass, hand spun paraboloid shade is lightly polished and left natural, then fitted to the neck.

Uses an included 12 volt, 3W LED wafer bulb. Inline switch.

23" h X 8.5" w

5" dia shade
